about_the_game: Missed the items and cars in the Volume 4 Speed Pass? Then you’ve come to the right place. The Need for Speed™ Unbound – Volume 4 Catch-Up Pack offers all 74 cosmetics and customizations from the Volume 4 Speed Pass plus both the Porsche 911 Legendary Custom and Legendary Custom Lotus Exige S (2006). With items including wheel rims, underglows, wrap editor decals, character apparel, poses, banner art, and more, this pack will get you right back up to speed.
detailed_description: Missed the items and cars in the Volume 4 Speed Pass? Then you’ve come to the right place. The Need for Speed™ Unbound – Volume 4 Catch-Up Pack offers all 74 cosmetics and customizations from the Volume 4 Speed Pass plus both the Porsche 911 Legendary Custom and Legendary Custom Lotus Exige S (2006). With items including wheel rims, underglows, wrap editor decals, character apparel, poses, banner art, and more, this pack will get you right back up to speed.
drm_notice: EA online activation and EA app software installation and background use required. Denuvo.
legal_notice: REQUIRES NEED FOR SPEED UNBOUND (SOLD SEPARATELY) AND ALL GAME UPDATES.
